name: Sabbir Mahmud
comment: I went there today for the first time. Even though it is tiny, it is jam packed. Great staff. Will try the meat tomorrow. üíñ

name: Ayon Jodder
comment: Brilliant food. The quality of the beef steaks was immaculate. So well cooked to perfection. The sides and house special elevates the experience multiple fold. I would blindly recommend Bengal Meat to anyone in lookout for meat based mealüíô

name: David Uncle
profession: Sous Chef, Mayer Doa Hotel & Restaurant
comment: The food was amazing and their service was also warm! üí®

name: Kabir Khan
comment: Awesome food with huge dining spaces, great service & proper hygiene. Overall experience is 10 on 10. Been there for several times and definitely looking forward to go again and again. Most amazing thing is that they also have a little space for the kids to play. True family destination to enjoy. üíöüëçüëè

name: Mir Hussain
profession: Paid Food Vlogger, I Live to Eat
comment: Worst service ever! Waited 2 hours for the meat but they said they need more time! After this worst management I walkes away without buying meat! üëä

name: Sourav Arefin
comment: Good environment and well behaved staffs. The steaks were really great. The ribs were one of the best. Loved it. üçø
